metadata.title: Black iMicro 3D Optical Wireless Mouse with Thumb-Size USB Receiver
features: iMicro MO-16SBK 3-Button Wireless 3D Optical Scroll Mouse General Features: Black color
USB receiver interface 3-Buttons 800 dpi 27 MHz radio frequency 256 ID channel
Scroll Wheel (acts as third button) 3D Optical Technology Plug and Play Ambidextrous design
Small, compact size, perfect for traveling Ideal for Notebook computers
Battery saving technology turns off mouse when not in use
description: Point your computer in the right direction. Unclutter your workspace with this iMicro MO-16SBK optical mouse! It features a wireless interface so you can get rid of those pesky wires all over your desk. Its easily maneuverable and features a 3-button design with a scroll wheel for effortless browsing. Its phenomenal 3D technology gives you access to 360 degrees of movement. Your mouse will always go where you want it to with its 800 Dpi technology. Its USB receiver is plug and play, convenient in the fact that there’s no installation needed. Operating on two “AAA” batteries, the mouse promotes long battery life with its battery saving technology that turns the mouse off when not in use. In case your mouse battery dies, there’s a retractable USB connector to keep you going. Get this iMicro MO-16SBK optical mouse and get going! General Features: Black color USB receiver interface 3-Buttons 800 dpi 27 MHz radio frequency 256 ID channel Scroll Wheel (acts as third button) 3D Optical Technology Plug and Play Ambidextrous design Small, compact size, perfect for traveling Ideal for Notebook computers Battery saving technology turns off mouse when not in use Package Includes: iMicro MO-16SBK 3-Button Wireless 3D Optical Scroll Mouse USB receiver USB retractable cable
